attributes.action: do more to discourage the use of throwaway plastic carrier bags in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the Prime Minister to make a commitment to put effective measures in place to discourage the use of non-compostable plastic bags and packaging by all suppliers, traders and customers and support local campaigns trying to raise awareness of the environmental impact of plastic.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
